compliance.title: 1. Privacy Policy
compliance.body: We handle personal information in line with applicable laws, regulations, and related guidelines, including Japan's Act on the Protection of Personal Information.

safety.body: We take organizational, physical, human, and technical measures to protect personal information from leakage, loss, or damage.

acquisitionCompliance.body: When acquiring, using, or providing personal information, we follow the principles below.

acquisition.body: We may collect personal information related to general users ("Users") or advertisers ("Advertisers") to the extent necessary to operate the services on this site.

purpose.body: Except as required by law or with the individual's consent, we use personal information only for the purposes below.

review.title: 9. Improvement and review
review.body: We regularly review our handling of personal information and related management systems, and continuously improve them.

disposal.title: 10. Disposal of personal information
disposal.body: When personal information is no longer needed for its purpose, we delete or dispose of it in an appropriate manner to prevent external leakage.

contact.title: 11. Contact for complaints and consultations
contact.body: We will set up a contact desk and a person responsible for inquiries regarding personal information.
